name: VOA (mid states) Employment Services
description: Volunteers of America Mid-States provides comprehensive social services including housing assistance, veteran services, intellectual and developmental disability services, health outreach and prevention, restorative justice programs, substance use recovery, and employment services. Serves vulnerable populations across Kentucky and surrounding states.
source: Verified from official website, Google search results, and business listings
notes: Main office location. Provides services across Kentucky and surrounding states. Contact for specific program information and eligibility requirements.
